sections.content:
Question:
I am using rh850-f1km-s4. I would also like to know, what are the other interfaces (other than ICUM) and external interfaces that can read out the  data/keys stored in secure Data Flash ? Those interfaces can be : Debugger (secure/ non secure) , Flash reader/programmer etc that we need to disable to protect the keys if any.
Answer:
For the debugger: if the ICUM is not protected by C&R(Challenge-Response (C&R) authentication), the debugger would have access to the secure Data Flash once it passed the initial protection of the debugging interface with the OCDID. If the protection is required, the C&R for the ICU-M needs to be activated. Also the upgrade protection 2 should be activated, as otherwise it would be possible to deactivate the ICU-M by rewriting the option bytes.
Suitable Products
RH850
